title: Island in the sun
text:
Home » travel » Island in the sun GETAWAYS THE NATION July 15, 2015 1:00 am 
U Koh Madsum Samui U Koh Madsum Samui, a single resort on a private island 40 minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Koh Samui, is currently offering an All Inclusive Vacation Package starting at Bt7,059 per person. SAMUI Island in the sun U Koh Madsum Samui , a single resort on a private island 40 minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Koh Samui , is currently offering an All Inclusive Vacation Package starting at Bt7,059 per person. Available from now until October 31, the offer includes two nights in a Tented Villa (twin sharing), daily breakfast and dinner set, roundtrip transportation from Samui airport to hotel by car and boat, minibar and wi-fi. Reservation at least 7 days in advance is required. Call (077) 953 009 or e-mail: reserve@ukohmadsumsamui.com. Visit www.UKohMadsum Samui .com. PATTAYA Making a splash Hotel Baraquda Pattaya MGallery Collection offers a summer promotion with a cool package - the Baraquda Pattaya - Splash n' Stay. Enjoy two consecutive nights stay including breakfast for two in a Deluxe Room plus unlimited fun with complimentary one day passes for two to Cartoon Network Amazone Pattaya . The price is Bt8,856 and the offer is valid through October 31. Call (038) 769 999 or book online at www.HotelBaraquda.com SINGAPORE In the Clover From now to October 31, three Hotel Clover properties in Singapore (Hotel Clover Hong Kong Street, Hotel Clover The Arts and Hotel Clover Jalan Sultan) are offering guests a room-stay package that comprises a hands-on cooking class in the home kitchen of one of Singapore's most experienced tutors, Ruqxana Vasanwala of Cookery Magic. A two-night stay for two starts from S$540 depending on room type and selected hotel. E-mail enquiries@hotelclover.com and quote Clover Wok Star. Visit www.HotelClover.com VIETNAM Wining and dining Eastin Grand Hotel Saigon, a mere 10-minutes by car from Tan Son Nhat International Airport and 15 minutes from the city centre, is offering a Sweet Stay, Sweet Dining One Night package. The offer includes one night in a Deluxe room along with a dining voucher worth US$20 that can be used in Cafe Saigon, Lotus Court or Iki plus a bottle of wine. Rates per night start from $147 for one person and $180 for two. The deal is good until July 31. Book online at www.EastinGrandSaigon.com or e-mail: rsvn@eastingrandsaigon.com. HONG KONG Room with a view JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is extending its attractive "Buy 2 Nights Get Third Night Free" accommodation package to September 6. Guests looking to indulge in a fantastic summer vacation can still take advantage of a complimentary third night, with a minimum two paid nights in the Premier Mountain View Room, Executive Mountain View Room or JW Suite with Harbour or Mountain View. Rates start from HK$2,500 per room per night. The offer requires a minimum stay of three consecutive nights. Quote promotional code "BGS" when making enquiries or booking. Call (+852) 2810 8366 or e-mail: jwmarriott.hk@marriotthotels.com. WORLDWIDE Stay and save More than 80 Shangri-La, Kerry and Traders hotels worldwide invites guests to take a summer trip and "Escape the Ordinary" through August 31. The offer includes complimentary breakfast, up to $200 food and beverage credit per stay and free wi-fi. Shangri-La's free Internet service will be made available to guests arriving by hotel limousine, while Golden Circle members can earn double Golden Circle Award Points during the promotion period. Children under the age of six (up to a maximum of two), and accompanied by a paying adult, will be served complimentary buffet meals in all day dining and pool cafes. Additional children aged between 6 and 12, staying at city hotels, will enjoy a 50-per-cent discount off the buffet price. Book online at www.Shangri-la.com until August 29 for stays this month and next. 260 Viewed
